Articles.Content:
Question about crew editing:

What are the states?

What are ToD and idx?

What do brave/dumb do?

Sorry fi this has been answered before.

Easier way... Get Crew Manifest Mod.... http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/18-1-kerbal-crew-manifest/

Oh and if you want to know what dumb does... just look at my NeoMorph Kerbal below... Poor old Jeb is worried...

Easier way... Get Crew Manifest Mod.... http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/18-1-kerbal-crew-manifest/

Oh and if you want to know what dumb does... just look at my NeoMorph Kerbal below... Poor old Jeb is worried...

Jeb was no dumber than Bill or Neo. When dumbers and Jeb gathered, the one person that will worry is Jeb.
